description:
With the truth about Rokuro exposed to Benio, the Twin Star Exorcists are confronted by someone who shares a connection to both of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Intertwining Tragedies: Tragedy Comes with Smile
Kousaku Suru Higeki: Tragedy Comes with Smile
İç İçe Geçmiş Felaket: Gülümsemeyle Gelen Felaket
交錯する悲劇 TRAGEDY COMES WITH SMILE
